customContent:
Thank you for stocking our pantry with very special holiday meals! As we count down to Thanksgiving, your support is especially critical because it will help us serve 83,000 mealsâ€¦ or more importantly, that one meal that will start another man or woman on a path toward a new life.

Help fill our pantry and continue to nourish the body and feed the soul of every guest we meet this fall.
